Translations.Text: mid-eum-eul gajgo seon-eul haenghaneun ja leul wihae hananim-eun geudeul-ui modeun joe leul sahayeo jul geos-imyeo geudeul-i haenghan gajang hullyunghan haeng-wie ttala bosangha lila

hananimkkeseo ingan-ege bumo-e ge hyodohala hayeossnola geuleona geudeulga alji moshaneun daleun geos-eul sungbaeha la gang-yohandamyeon geudeul-ege sunjonghaji malla neohuineun god naega neohuiege al lyeo jul geos-ila
hananim-eun mid-eum-eul gajgo seon-eul silcheonhaneun ideullo hayeogeum uiloun salamgaunde deulge halila

salamdeul jung-eneun jeohuineun hana nim-eul midnaida lago malhana geudeul i hananim-ui gil-eseo jaenan-eul danghaess eul ttaeneun geugeos-eul machi hananim-ui bag haelo saeng-gaghaneun jadeul-i issdeola geu leona junim-ui eunhyelo seungliga ileul ttaemyeon ulido neohuiwa hamkke iss-eossdo da lago malhanila geuleona hananim eun ingandeul-ui simjung-e issneun geosdeul-eul moleusineun bun-i anisila
hananimkkeseoneun mid-eum-eul gajinjadeulgwa mid-eum-eul gajanghaneun wiseonjadeul-eul jal asinola
bulsinjadeul-i mid-eum-eul gajin ja deul-ege uliui gil-eul ttaleula uli ga neohuideul-ui joeleul jeolm-eojililago malhana geudeul-ui joedo daesinhal su eobs nani sillo geudeul-eun geojismaljang-ila
geuleona geudeul-eun jagi jasindeul ui jimgwa geubakk-ui daleun jimdeul-eul simpan ui nal-e jilm-eojigo wa geudeul-i geojis eul kkumyeossdeon sasil-e daehayeo jilmun-eul bad-eulila
hananim-eun noaleul geuui baegseong ege bonaeeo osibnyeon-i mojalan cheon nyeon-eul meomulge hayeoss-eul ttae geudeul-ui joeag-eulo malmiam-a daeheungsuga geudeul eul deopchige haessnola
